mapping_complete_1:
The mapping has been completed.
The output file has been saved to
mapping_complete_2: The custom mapping file has been saved to
file_exists:
A file already exists in the path(s) in the orange box(es).
The file(s) will be overwritten if you continue.
Press 'Enter' to continue, 'Esc' to go back.
enter_divider: Enter a divider, or select indices manually:
select_output: Select the output fields in the right tab
select_fields: Select multiple fields in the left tab, the result is shown in the right tab.
required_fields_incomplete:
Not all required fields are completed.
Continuing now will render an invalid output file.
Press 'Enter' to continue, 'Esc' to go back.
exit_warning:
Are you sure you want to exit the program now?
All progress will be lost.
Press 'Enter' to continue, 'Esc' to go back.
return_to_p1_warning:
Are you sure you want to retun to page 1?
 All progrss will be lost.
Press 'Enter' to continue, 'Esc' to go back.
